/** * Definition for a binary tree node. * function TreeNode(val, left, right) { *     this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val) *     this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left) *     this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right) * } *//** * @param {TreeNode} root * @return {number[]} */var preorderTraversal = function(root) {    let result = []    let preorder = data => {        if (data) {            result.push(data.val)            preorder(data.left)            preorder(data.right)        }    }    preorder(root)    return result};

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
/**
  • æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼/é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ±‚è§£è¿ç®—è¡¨è¾¾å¼
  • /
/**
  • å•é“¾è¡¨çš„å­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„
  • /
    typedef struct LNode {
      string data; //æ•°æ®åŸŸ
      struct LNode *next; //æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸ
    }Lnode, *LinkList; //LinkListä¸ºæŒ‡å‘ç»“æ„ä½“LNodeçš„æŒ‡é’ˆç±»å‹
/* åˆå§‹åŒ–é“¾è¡¨ */
void InitList(LinkList &L) {
    L = new LNode;
    L->next = NULL;
}
/* æ‰“å° */
void TraverseList(LinkList & L){
        LNode *p = new LNode;
        p = L->next;
        // cout << "æ­¤ä¸­ç¼€è¡¨è¾¾å¼é“¾è¡¨æ‰“å°çš„ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š";
        while (p != NULL)
        {
            cout << p->data;
            p = p->next;
        }
        cout << "
";
}
/* é€†ç½® */
void ReverseList(LinkList &L) {
    LNode *p = L->next;
    L->next = NULL;
    while(p)
    {
        LNode *q = p->next;
        p->next = L->next;
        L->next = p;
        p = q;
    }
}
/**
  • åˆå§‹åŒ–ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥çš„é“¾è¡¨
  • /
    void Center(LinkList &L,string s) {
      InitList(L);
      LinkList p = L;
      string temp = "";
      for (int i = 0; i < s.length();i++){
      // å¤„ç†åŒä½æ•°å­—æƒ…å†µ  if (isdigit(s[i])) {      // è¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸ºæ•°å­—      temp = temp + s[i];      if (!isdigit(s[i+1])) {          // ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä¸æ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œå°†tempåæ’          LinkList node = new LNode;          node->data = temp;          node->next = NULL;          p->next = node;          p = node;          // å°†tempé‡ç½®          temp = "";          continue;      }      continue;  }  // åæ’åˆ°Lå°¾å·´ä¸Š  LinkList node = new LNode;  node->data = s[i];  node->next = NULL;  p->next = node;  p = node;
      }
    }
/**
  • å°†è¡¨è¾¾å¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼/é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼
  • ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯¹é€†æ³¢å…°è€Œè¨€æ˜¯å·¦æ‹¬å·ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯¹é€†æ³¢å…°è€Œè¨€æ˜¯å³æ‹¬å·
  • å¯¹æ³¢å…°è€Œè¨€åè¿‡æ¥
  • /
    void Transition(LinkList &L, string l, string r){
      // å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆç”¨æ¥å¤„ç†
      stack<string> stack;
      LinkList p = L->next;
      LinkList result = new LNode;
      InitList(result);
      LinkList result_a = result;
      while(p != NULL) {
      if (p->data == l) {      stack.push(p->data);  } else if(p->data == r) {      while(stack.top() != l){          LinkList temp = new LNode;          temp->data = stack.top();          temp->next = NULL;          result_a->next = temp;          result_a = temp;          stack.pop();      }      if (stack.top() == l){          stack.pop();      }  } else if(p->data == "+" || p->data == "-") {      if (stack.size() != 0) {          if (stack.top() == "*" || stack.top() == "/"){              for (int i = 0; i < stack.size();i++) {                  if (stack.top() == l) {                      break;                  }                  LinkList temp = new LNode;                  temp->data = stack.top();                  temp->next = NULL;                  result_a->next = temp;                  result_a = temp;                  stack.pop();              }          }      }      stack.push(p->data);  } else if(p->data == "*" || p->data == "/") {      stack.push(p->data);  } else {      LinkList temp = new LNode;      temp->data = p->data;      temp->next = NULL;      result_a->next = temp;      result_a = temp;  }  p = p->next;
      }
      // TraverseList(result);
      for (int i = 0; i < stack.size();i++) {
      LinkList temp = new LNode;  temp->data = stack.top();  temp->next = NULL;  result_a->next = temp;  result_a = temp;  stack.pop();
      }
      // ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªæ“ä½œæ€»æ˜¯ä¸èƒ½æ¸…ç©ºæ ˆçš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
      LinkList temp = new LNode;
      temp->data = stack.top();
      temp->next = NULL;
      result_a->next = temp;
      result_a = temp;
      stack.pop();
      L = result;
    }
/**
  • è®¡ç®—
  • /
void EvaulTree(LinkList &L) {
    // å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆç”¨æ¥å¤„ç†
    stack<string> stack;
    LinkList p = L->next;
    while(p != NULL) {
        if (p->data == "+"){
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(y + x));
        } else if(p->data == "-") {
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(y - x));
        } else if(p->data == "*") {
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(y * x));
        } else if(p->data == "/") {
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(y / x));
        } else {
            stack.push(p->data);
        }
        p = p->next;
    }
    while (!stack.empty()){
        cout << stoi(stack.top());
        stack.pop();
    }
}
void EvaulTree_polish(LinkList &L) {
    // å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆç”¨æ¥å¤„ç†
    stack<string> stack;
    LinkList p = L->next;
    while(p != NULL) {
        if (p->data == "+"){
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(x + y));
        } else if(p->data == "-") {
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(x - y));
        } else if(p->data == "*") {
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(x * y));
        } else if(p->data == "/") {
            int x = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            int y = stoi(stack.top());
            stack.pop();
            stack.push(to_string(x / y));
        } else {
            stack.push(p->data);
        }
        p = p->next;
    }
    while (!stack.empty()){
        cout << stoi(stack.top());
        stack.pop();
    }
}
int main () {
    cout << "â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”"<<"
";
    string s;
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¿ç®—è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼š"<<"
";
    cin >> s;
    LinkList test_reversepolish = new LNode;
    InitList(test_reversepolish);
    LinkList test_polish = new LNode;
    InitList(test_polish);
Center(test_reversepolish, s);Center(test_polish, s);cout << "------------------------------------"<<"
";// æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼ReverseList(test_polish);Transition(test_polish, ")", "(");cout << "æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸ºï¼š";ReverseList(test_polish);TraverseList(test_polish);cout << "æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼è®¡ç®—ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š";ReverseList(test_polish);EvaulTree_polish(test_polish);cout << "
"<<"------------------------------------"<<"
";// é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼Transition(test_reversepolish, "(", ")");cout << "é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸ºï¼š";TraverseList(test_reversepolish);cout << "é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼è®¡ç®—ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š";EvaulTree(test_reversepolish);cout << "

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef int Status;typedef int ElemType;#define OVERFLOW -1#define ERROR 0#define OK 1
//â€”â€”ä¸²çš„é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„â€”â€“
#define MAXLEN 225
typedef struct
{

    int length;             //ä¸²çš„å½“å‰é•¿åº¦
}SString;
//â€”â€”ä¸²çš„å †å¼é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„â€”â€“
typedef struct
{
    char *ch;       //è‹¥æ˜¯éç©ºä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™æŒ‰ä¸²é•¿åˆ†é…å­˜å‚¨åŒºï¼Œå¦åˆ™chä¸ºNULL
    int length;     //ä¸²çš„å½“å‰é•¿åº¦
}HString;
HString S, T;
//â€”â€“ä¸²çš„é“¾å¼å­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„â€”â€“
#define CHUNKSIZE 80
typedef struct Chunk
{

}Chunk;
typedef struct
{
    Chunk *head, *tail;     //ä¸²çš„å¤´æŒ‡é’ˆå’Œå°¾æŒ‡é’ˆ
    int length;             //ä¸²çš„å½“å‰é•¿åº¦
}LString;
// //1ã€ç”Ÿæˆä¸²
// StrAssign(&T, chars)
// //2ã€å¤åˆ¶
// StrCopy(&T, S)
// //3ã€åˆ¤ç©º
// StrEmpty(S)
// //4ã€æ¯”è¾ƒ
// StrCompare(S, T)
// //5ã€é•¿åº¦
// StrLength(S)
// //6ã€æ¸…ç©º
// ClearString(&S)
// //7ã€è”æ¥
// Concat(&T, S1, S2)
// //8ã€å­ä¸²
// SubString(&Sub, S, pos, len)
//9ã€ä¸²çš„æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…_BFç®—æ³• O(n * m)
int Index_BF(HString S, HString T, int pos)
{//è¿”å›æ¨¡å¼Tåœ¨ä¸»ä¸²sä¸­ç¬¬posä¸ªå­—ç¬¦å¼€å§‹ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å‡ºç°çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚è‹¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å€¼ä¸º0
 //å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒTéç©ºï¼Œ1<=pos<=S.length
    int i = pos, j = 1;                     //åˆå§‹åŒ–
    while(i <= S.length && j <= T.length)   //ä¸¤ä¸²å‡æœªæ¯”è¾ƒåˆ°ä¸²å°¾
    {
        if(S.ch[i] == T.ch[j])              //ç»§ç»­æ¯”è¾ƒåç»§å­—ç¬¦
        {
            i++;
            j++;
        }
        else                                //æŒ‡é’ˆåé€€é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹åŒ¹é…
        {
            i = i - j + 2;                  //i=i-j+1å›åˆ°içš„èµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œ+2åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦
            j = 1;
        }
    }
    if(j > T.length)
            return i - T.length;            //åŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›Tåœ¨Sä¸­ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å‡ºç°çš„ä½ç½®
        else
            return 0;
}
//9ã€ä¸²çš„æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…_KMPç®—æ³•æ±‚nextæ•°ç»„
void get_next(HString, int next[])
{//æ±‚æ¨¡å¼ä¸²Tçš„nextå‡½æ•°å€¼å¹¶å­˜å…¥æ•°ç»„next
    int j = 1, t = 0;
    next[1] = 0;
    while(j < T.length)
    {
        if(t == 0 || T.ch[j] == T.ch[t])
        {
            t++;
            j++;
            next[j] = t;
        }
        else
            t = next[t];
    }
}
//9ã€ä¸²çš„æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…_KMPç®—æ³•æ±‚nextvalæ•°ç»„
void get_nextval(HString T, int nextval[])
{//æ±‚æ¨¡å¼ä¸²Tçš„nextå‡½æ•°ä¿®æ­£å€¼å¹¶å­˜å…¥æ•°ç»„nextval
    int j = 1, t = 0;
    nextval[1] = 0;
    while(j < T.length)
    {
        if(t == 0 || T.ch[j] == T.ch[t])
        {
            t++;
            j++;
            if(T.ch[j] != T.ch[t])
                nextval[j] = t;
            else
                nextval[j] = nextval[t];
        }
        else
            t = nextval[t];
    }
}
//9ã€ä¸²çš„æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…_KMPç®—æ³• O(n + m)
int Index_KMP(HString S, HString T, int pos, int next[])
{//åˆ©ç”¨æ¨¡å¼ä¸²Tçš„nextå‡½æ•°æ±‚Tåœ¨ä¸»ä¸²Sä¸­ç¬¬posä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¹‹åçš„ä½ç½®
 //å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒTéç©ºï¼Œ1<=pos<=S.length
    int i = pos, j = 1;
    while(i <= S.length && j <= S.length)   //ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸²å‡æœªæ¯”è¾ƒåˆ°ä¸²å°¾
    {
        if(j == 0 || S.ch[i] == T.ch[i])    //ç»§ç»­æ¯”è¾ƒåç»§å­—ç¬¦
        {
            i++;
            j++;
        }
        else
            j = next[j];                    //æ¨¡å¼ä¸²å‘å³ç§»åŠ¨
        if(j > T.length)                    //åŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸ
            return i - T.length;
        else
            return 0;
    }
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
typedef int Status;
typedef int QElemType;
#define OVERFLOW -1
#define ERROR 0
#define OK 1
/**
    å®éªŒ4ï¼šé˜Ÿåˆ—çš„é“¾å¼è¡¨ç¤ºå’Œå®ç°
    è¦æ±‚ï¼šæŸå°è¶…å¸‚æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæ’é˜Ÿæœºï¼Œæ„å»º2ä¸ªç”¨å¸¦å¤´ç»“ç‚¹çš„å•é“¾è¡¨é˜Ÿåˆ—QAå’ŒQB, å®ç°ä¸‹åˆ—æ“ä½œ
        1ã€åˆå§‹åŒ–é˜Ÿåˆ—(æ¸…ç©º)ï¼›
        2ã€å…¥é˜Ÿï¼›
        3ã€å‡ºé˜Ÿ;
        4ã€æ±‚é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ï¼›
        5ã€åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼›
        6ã€åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ»¡ï¼›
        7ã€å¯¹äºé˜Ÿåˆ—QAå’ŒQBï¼Œå¦‚æœå…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å”®è´§å‘˜ä¸‹ç­ï¼Œåˆ™è‡ªåŠ¨ç”©åˆ°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—åé¢ã€‚
 */
/* å­˜å‚¨å½¢å¼ */
typedef struct QNode{ //é“¾é˜Ÿç”¨çš„ç»“ç‚¹
    QElemType data;
    struct QNode *next;
}QNode,*QueuePtr;
typedef struct {
    QueuePtr front;
    QueuePtr rear;
}LinkQueue;
/* åˆå§‹åŒ– */
Status InitQueue(LinkQueue &queue) {
    queue.front = queue.rear = new QNode;
    queue.front->next = NULL;
    return OK;
}
/* æ±‚é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ */
Status QueueLength(LinkQueue &queue) {
    int count = 0;
    if (queue.rear == queue.front) {
        return count;
    }
    QueuePtr temp = queue.front;
    while (temp != queue.rear) {
        count++;
        temp = temp->next;
    }
    return count;
}
/* å…¥é˜Ÿ */
Status EnQueue(LinkQueue &queue, QElemType e, int length) {
    if (QueueLength(queue) <length) {
        QueuePtr temp = new QNode;
        temp->data = e;
        temp->next = NULL;
        queue.rear->next = temp;
        queue.rear = temp;
        return OK;
    } else {
        cout << "é˜Ÿå·²ç»æ»¡äº†ï¼Œä¸èƒ½å†å…¥å…ƒç´ äº†"<< "
";
        return ERROR;
    }
}
/* å‡ºé˜Ÿ */
Status DeQueue(LinkQueue &queue) {
    if (queue.front == queue.rear) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    // æœ‰å¿…è¦å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªpï¼Œä¸ç„¶å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ä¼šæ‰
    QueuePtr p = queue.front->next;
    QElemType e = p->data;
    queue.front->next = p->next;
    // è€ƒè™‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ è¢«åˆ ï¼Œé˜Ÿå°¾æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
    if (queue.rear == p) {
        queue.rear = queue.front;
    }
    return e;
}
/* å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´  */
// Status GetHead(LinkQueue &queue) {
//     if (queue.front != queue.rear){
//         return queue.front->next->data;
//     }
// }
/* åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º */
bool QueueIsEmpty(LinkQueue &queue) {
    if (queue.rear == queue.front) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}
/**
  • åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ»¡

entry.title: C++é˜Ÿåˆ—é¡ºåºå’Œé“¾å¼å®ç°åŠæ“ä½œ
entry.content:
é¡ºåºå¾ªç¯é˜Ÿåˆ—


#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
typedef int Status;
typedef int QElemType;
#define OVERFLOW -1
#define ERROR 0
#define OK 1
#define MAXSIZE 100
/**
  • å¾ªç¯é˜Ÿåˆ—â€”â€”é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„é¡ºåºè¡¨ç¤ºå’Œå®ç°
  • æ“ä½œï¼šåˆå§‹åŒ–ã€é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ã€å…¥é˜Ÿã€å‡ºé˜Ÿã€å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´ 
  • /
/* å­˜å‚¨å½¢å¼ */
typedef struct {
    QElemType *base;
    int front;
    int rear;
} SqQueue;
/* åˆå§‹åŒ– */
Status InitQueue(SqQueue &queue) {
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–è¿™ä¸ªbaseåœ°å€ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æœ€å¤§å®¹é‡çš„æ•°ç»„åˆåœ°å€
    queue.base = new int[MAXSIZE];
    if (!queue.base) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    queue.front = queue.rear = 0;
    return OK;
}
/* æ±‚é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ */
Status QueueLength(SqQueue &queue) {
    return (queue.rear - queue.front + MAXSIZE) % MAXSIZE;
}
/* å…¥é˜Ÿ */
Status EnQueue(SqQueue &queue, QElemType e) {
    if ((queue.rear+1)%MAXSIZE == queue.front) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    queue.base[queue.rear] = e;
    queue.rear = (queue.rear + 1) % MAXSIZE;
    return OK;
}
/* å‡ºé˜Ÿ */
Status DeQueue(SqQueue &queue) {
    if ((queue.rear+1)%MAXSIZE == queue.front) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    QElemType e = queue.base[queue.front];
    queue.front = (queue.front + 1) % MAXSIZE; //é˜Ÿå¤´æŒ‡é’ˆ+1
    return e;
}
/* å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´  */
Status GetHead(SqQueue &queue) {
    if (queue.front != queue.rear) {
        return queue.base[queue.front];
    }
}
int main() {
    SqQueue test;
    InitQueue(test);
    EnQueue(test, 10);
    EnQueue(test, 15);
    EnQueue(test, 20);
    cout << "é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ä¸ºï¼š" << QueueLength(test) << "
";
    cout << GetHead(test)<<" "<< GetHead(test)<<" "<< GetHead(test)<<" "<<"
";
    cout << DeQueue(test)<<" "<< DeQueue(test)<<" "<< DeQueue(test)<<" "<<"
";
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
typedef int Status;
typedef int QElemType;
#define OVERFLOW -1
#define ERROR 0
#define OK 1
#define MAXSIZE 100
/**
  • é“¾é˜Ÿâ€”â€”é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„é“¾å¼è¡¨ç¤ºå’Œå®ç°
  • æ“ä½œï¼šåˆå§‹åŒ–ã€å…¥é˜Ÿã€å‡ºé˜Ÿã€å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´ 
  • /
/* å­˜å‚¨å½¢å¼ */
typedef struct QNode{ //é“¾é˜Ÿç”¨çš„ç»“ç‚¹
    QElemType data;
    struct QNode *next;
}QNode,*QueuePtr;
typedef struct {
    QueuePtr front;
    QueuePtr rear;
}LinkQueue;
/* åˆå§‹åŒ– */
Status InitQueue(LinkQueue &queue) {
    queue.front = queue.rear = new QNode;
    queue.front->next = NULL;
    return OK;
}
/* å…¥é˜Ÿ */
Status EnQueue(LinkQueue &queue, QElemType e) {
    QueuePtr temp = new QNode;
    temp->data = e;
    temp->next = NULL;
    queue.rear->next = temp;
    queue.rear = temp;
    return OK;
}
/* å‡ºé˜Ÿ */
Status DeQueue(LinkQueue &queue) {
    if (queue.front == queue.rear) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    QElemType e = queue.front->next->data;
    queue.front->next = queue.front->next->next;
    // è€ƒè™‘æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ è¢«åˆ ï¼Œé˜Ÿå°¾æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
    if (queue.rear == queue.front) {
        queue.front = queue.rear;
    }
    return e;
}
/* å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´  */
Status GetHead(LinkQueue &queue) {
    if (queue.front != queue.rear){
        return queue.front->next->data;
    }
}
int main() {
    LinkQueue test;
    InitQueue(test);
    EnQueue(test, 10);
    EnQueue(test, 15);
    EnQueue(test, 20);
    // cout << "é˜Ÿåˆ—é•¿åº¦ä¸ºï¼š" << QueueLength(test) << "
";
    cout << GetHead(test)<<" "<< GetHead(test)<<" "<< GetHead(test)<<" "<<"
";
    cout << DeQueue(test)<<" "<< DeQueue(test)<<" "<< DeQueue(test)<<" "<<"
";
}

å­˜å‚¨å½¢å¼ä»¥åŠæ“ä½œå’Œé¡ºåºè¡¨å’Œé“¾è¡¨å·®ä¸å¤šï¼Œéœ€è¦çš„æ“ä½œä¹Ÿå°‘ï¼Œå­¦æ ˆå’Œé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œæ„Ÿè§‰åªæ˜¯æŠ½ç¦»å‡ºæ¥è¿™ä¸¤ç§ä¾¿äºåœ¨åº”ç”¨å±‚é¢ä½¿ç”¨

é¡ºåºæ ˆ

#include<bits/stdc++.h>typedef int Status;typedef int SElemType;#define OVERFLOW -1#define ERROR 0#define OK 1#define MAXSIZE 100
using namespace std;
/**
  • é¡ºåºæ ˆ
  • é¡ºåºæ ˆçš„åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œï¼šåˆå§‹åŒ–ã€å…¥æ ˆã€å‡ºæ ˆã€å–æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ 
  • /
/* é¡ºåºæ ˆçš„å­˜å‚¨å½¢å¼ */
typedef struct {
    SElemType *base;
    SElemType *top;
    int stacksize;
} SqStack;
/* åˆå§‹åŒ– */
Status InitSqStack(SqStack &stack) {
    // ä¸ºæ ˆåˆ†é…å®¹é‡
    stack.base = new int[MAXSIZE];
    // åˆ†é…å¤±è´¥è¿”å›å¤±è´¥å€¼
    if (!stack.base) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    // è®©æ ˆé¡¶åœ°å€åˆå§‹ä¸ºæ ˆåº•åœ°å€
    stack.top = stack.base;
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–å®¹é‡
    stack.stacksize = MAXSIZE;
    return OK;
}
/* å…¥æ ˆ */
Status Push(SqStack &stack, SElemType e) {
    if (stack.top - stack.base == stack.stacksize) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    *stack.top = e; // å…ˆåœ¨topä½ç½®èµ‹å€¼
    stack.top++; // å°†topåœ°å€++
    return OK;
}
/* å‡ºæ ˆ */
Status Pop(SqStack &stack) {
    // ç©ºæ ˆè¿”å›å¼‚å¸¸
    if (stack.top == stack.base) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    stack.topâ€“; // æ ˆé¡¶åœ°å€å‡1
    return *stack.top; // è¿”å›æ­¤æ—¶â€œæ ˆé¡¶â€å…ƒç´ 
}
/* å–æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´  */
Status GetTop (SqStack &stack) {
    // ç©ºæ ˆè¿”å›å¼‚å¸¸
    if (stack.top == stack.base) {
        return OVERFLOW;
    }
    // stack.topâ€“; // æ ˆé¡¶åœ°å€å‡1ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯å’Œå‡ºæ ˆçš„åŒºåˆ«
    return *(stack.top-1); // è¿”å›æ­¤æ—¶â€œæ ˆé¡¶â€å…ƒç´ 
}
int main() {
    SqStack test;
    InitSqStack(test);
    Push(test, 10);
    Push(test, 15);
    Push(test, 20);
    cout << GetTop(test)<<" "<< GetTop(test)<<" "<< GetTop(test)<<" "<<"
";
    cout << Pop(test)<<" "<< Pop(test)<<" "<< Pop(test)<<" "<<"
";
}

/* å…¥æ ˆ */

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
/**
  • æ±‚ä¸¤ä¸ªé›†åˆLAå’ŒLB(ç”¨å•é“¾è¡¨è¡¨ç¤º)çš„å¹¶å’Œäº¤é›†
  • /
/* å•é“¾è¡¨çš„å­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„ */
typedef struct LNode {
    int data; //æ•°æ®åŸŸ
    struct LNode *next; //æŒ‡é’ˆåŸŸ
}Lnode, *LinkList; //LinkListä¸ºæŒ‡å‘ç»“æ„ä½“LNodeçš„æŒ‡é’ˆç±»å‹
/* åˆå§‹åŒ–é“¾è¡¨ */
void InitList(LinkList &L) {
    L = new LNode;
    L->next = NULL;
}
/* åˆ›å»ºï¼šåæ’ */
void CreateList_R(LinkList &L, int n) {
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥" << n << "ä¸ªæ•°å­—"<< "
";
    InitList(L);
    // å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªåœ¨ä¸‹é¢å¾ªç¯ç”¨æ¥ä¸€ç›´æ“ä½œæ‰€åŠ å…ƒç´ çš„ç»“ç‚¹pæ¥æŒ‡å‘å¤´ç»“ç‚¹L
    LinkList p = L;
    for (int i = 0; i < n;i++) {
        LinkList q = new Lnode;
        q->next = NULL;
        cin >> q->data;
        p->next = q;
        p = q; //ä¸ºäº†ä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡
    }
}
/* æ‰“å° */
void TraverseList(LinkList & L){
        LinkList p = new LNode;
        p = L->next;
        cout << "æ­¤é“¾è¡¨æ‰“å°çš„ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š"<< "
";
        while (p != NULL)
        {
            cout << p->data << " ";
            p = p->next;
        }
        cout << "
";
}
/* æ’åºå•é“¾è¡¨ */
void sort(LinkList &L) {
}
/* jiaoç®—æ³• */
void jiao(LinkList &A,LinkList &B) {
    // ç”¨åŒå¾ªç¯å¾—å‡ºå…±æœ‰çš„å…ƒç´ å¹¶è¾“å‡º
    LinkList p;
    InitList(p);
    A = A->next;
    B = B->next;
    while (A != NULL ) {
        LinkList copy_b = B;
        while(copy_b != NULL) {
            if (A->data == copy_b->data) {
                LinkList temp = new Lnode;
                temp->data = copy_b->data;
                temp->next = p->next;
                p->next = temp;
                break;
            } else {
                copy_b = copy_b->next;
            }
        }
        A = A->next;
    }
while(p->next != NULL) {    cout << p->next->data << " ";    p = p->next;}
}
/* bingç®—æ³• */
void bing(LinkList &A,LinkList &B) {
    LinkList p = A;
    LinkList s = B;
A = A->next;B = B->next;while (A != NULL ) {    LinkList copy_b = B;    while(copy_b != NULL) {        if (A->data == copy_b->data) {            // cout << A->data << "
";            // åœ¨pé“¾é‡Œé¢åˆ é™¤A->dataå€¼            LinkList q = p;            while(q->next != NULL) {                if (q->next->data == A->data) {                    q->next = q->next->next;                    break;                } else {                    q = q->next;                }            }            break;        } else {            copy_b = copy_b->next;        }    }    A = A->next;}// å°†pé“¾è¡¨è¿æ¥åˆ°sé“¾è¡¨ä¸ŠLinkList result = p;while (p != NULL) {    if (p->next == NULL) {        p->next = s->next;        break;    }    p = p->next;}while(result->next != NULL) {    cout << result->next->data << " ";    result = result->next;}
}
int main() {
    LinkList list_A;
    LinkList list_B;
    InitList(list_A);
    InitList(list_B);
    CreateList_R(list_A, 6);
    CreateList_R(list_B, 6);
    LinkList list_C = list_A;
    LinkList list_D = list_B;
    cout <<"Aã€Bäº¤é›†çš„å€¼ä¸ºï¼š";
    jiao(list_A, list_B);
    cout <<"
"<<"Aã€Bå¹¶é›†çš„å€¼ä¸ºï¼š";
    bing(list_C, list_D);
}

class StorageFn {    constructor () {        this.ls = window.localStorage;        this.ss = window.sessionStorage;    }
/*-----------------cookie---------------------*//*è®¾ç½®cookie*/setCookie (name, value, day) {    var setting = arguments[0];    if (Object.prototype.toString.call(setting).slice(8, -1) === 'Object'){        for (var i in setting) {            var oDate = new Date();            oDate.setDate(oDate.getDate() + day);            document.cookie = i + '=' + setting[i] + ';expires=' + oDate;        }    }else{        var oDate = new Date();        oDate.setDate(oDate.getDate() + day);        document.cookie = name + '=' + value + ';expires=' + oDate;    }    }/*è·å–cookie*/getCookie (name) {    var arr = document.cookie.split('; ');    for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {        var arr2 = arr[i].split('=');        if (arr2[0] == name) {            return arr2[1];        }    }    return '';}/*åˆ é™¤cookie*/removeCookie (name) {    this.setCookie(name, 1, -1);}/*-----------------localStorage---------------------*//*è®¾ç½®localStorage*/setLocal(key, val) {    var setting = arguments[0];    if (Object.prototype.toString.call(setting).slice(8, -1) === 'Object'){        for(var i in setting){            this.ls.setItem(i, JSON.stringify(setting[i]))        }    }else{        this.ls.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(val))    }    }/*è·å–localStorage*/getLocal(key) {    if (key) return JSON.parse(this.ls.getItem(key))    return null;    }/*ç§»é™¤localStorage*/removeLocal(key) {    this.ls.removeItem(key)}/*ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰localStorage*/clearLocal() {    this.ls.clear()}/*-----------------sessionStorage---------------------*//*è®¾ç½®sessionStorage*/setSession(key, val) {    var setting = arguments[0];    if (Object.prototype.toString.call(setting).slice(8, -1) === 'Object'){        for(var i in setting){            this.ss.setItem(i, JSON.stringify(setting[i]))        }    }else{        this.ss.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(val))    }    }/*è·å–sessionStorage*/getSession(key) {    if (key) return JSON.parse(this.ss.getItem(key))    return null;    }/*ç§»é™¤sessionStorage*/removeSession(key) {    this.ss.removeItem(key)}/*ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰sessionStorage*/clearSession() {    this.ss.clear()}
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
/**
  • å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå•é“¾è¡¨
  • /
    typedef struct LNode {
      int data;
      struct LNode *next;
    }Lnode, *LinkList;
/**
  • åˆå§‹åŒ–å•é“¾è¡¨
  • /
    void InitList(LinkList &L) {
      L = new LNode;
      L->next = NULL;
      L->data = 1;
    }
/* åˆå§‹åŒ–å¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨çš„åˆå§‹å€¼ */
void init_add(LinkList &L, int n) {
    InitList(L);
    LinkList p = L;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n;i++) {
        LinkList p_temp = new Lnode;
        p_temp->data = i;
        if (i == n) {
            p_temp->next = L;
            p->next = p_temp;
        } else {
            p_temp->next = p->next;
            p->next = p_temp;
            p = p->next;
        }
    }
}
void joseph_ring(LinkList &L, int n, int m, int k) {
    init_add(L, n);
    LinkList p = L;
    for (int i = 0; i< m; i++) {
        p = p->next;
    }
    while(p->next != p) {
        for (int j = 1; j< k; j++) {
            if (j == k-1) {
                cout<<p->next->data<<"å·å‡ºæ¥"<<"
";
                p->next = p->next->next;
                p = p->next;
            } else {
                p = p->next;
            }
        }
    }
    cout<< p->data<<"å·å‡ºæ¥"<<"
";
}
int main()
{
    cout << "è¯·ä¾æ¬¡è¾“å…¥äººæ•°nã€æŠ¥æ•°ä½ç½®mã€æŠ¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šå€¼å°±ç«™èµ·æ¥çš„kå€¼" << "
";
    int n, m, k;
    cin >> n >> m >> k;
    LinkList p;
    joseph_ring(p, n, m, k);
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
typedef struct LNode {
    int data;
    struct LNode *next;
}Lnode, *LinkList;
LinkList L;
void InitList(LinkList &L) {
    L = new LNode;
    L->next = NULL;
}
void CreateList_H(LinkList &L) {
    InitList(L);
    int n;
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¦ä½¿ç”¨å‰æ’æ³•æ’å…¥çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ï¼š";
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){
        LNode *p = new LNode;
        cin >> p->data;
        p->next = L->next;
        L->next = p;
    }
}
void TraverseList(LinkList &L){
    LNode *p = new LNode;
    p = L->next;
    cout << "æ­¤é“¾è¡¨æ‰“å°çš„ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š"<<"
";
    while (p != NULL){
        cout << p->data << " ";
        p = p->next;
    }
    cout << "
";
}
void GetElem(LinkList &L) {
    int n;
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¦æŸ¥è¯¢çš„é“¾è¡¨ä¸­ç¬¬iä¸ªæ•°ï¼š";
    cin >> n;
    LNode *p = new LNode;
    p = L;
    for (int i = 0; i < n;i++){
        p = p->next;
    }
    cout << "æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š" << p->data<<"
";
}
void ListInsert(LinkList &L){
    LNode *p = new LNode;
    p = L;
    int n;
    int e;
    cout << "è¯·åˆ†åˆ«è¾“å…¥è¦åœ¨ç¬¬nä¸ªä½ç½®æ’å…¥çš„eå€¼ï¼š";
    cin >> n>> e ;
    for (int i = 0; i < n;i++) {
        if (n == i+1){
            LNode *temp = new LNode;
            temp->data = e;
            temp->next = p->next;
            p->next = temp;
            break;
        }
        p = p->next;
    }
    TraverseList(L); // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›Lå°±å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼Œä¹‹å‰è¿”å›pæ˜¯ä¸å¯ä»¥çš„ï¼ï¼ï¼å”‰ï¼Œå¤§æ„äº†~
}
void ListDelete(LinkList &L){
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¦åˆ é™¤çš„ç¬¬jä¸ªä½ç½®çš„jå€¼ï¼š";
    LNode *p = new LNode;
    p = L;
    int j;
    cin >> j;
    for (int i = 0; i < j;i++) {
        if (j == i+1) {
            p->next = p->next->next;
            break;
        }
        p = p->next;
    }
    TraverseList(L);
}
void ReverseList(LinkList &L) {
    LNode *p = L->next;
    L->next = NULL;
    while(p)
    {
        LNode *q = p->next;
        p->next = L->next;
        L->next = p;
        p = q;
    }
    cout << "é€šè¿‡é€†ç½®ä¹‹åâ€¦â€¦";
    TraverseList(L);
}
int main() {
    LNode *test = new LNode;
    CreateList_H(test);//1
    TraverseList(test);//1
    GetElem(test);//2
    ListInsert(test);//3
    ListDelete(test);//4
    ReverseList(test);//5
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;
/**

/**
  • åˆå§‹åŒ–å•é“¾è¡¨å¹¶å°†å…¶å˜æˆå¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨
  • /
void CircleList(LinkList &L, int n) {
    InitList(L);
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„å€¼
    L->data = 1;
    LinkList p = L;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        LinkList temp = new Lnode;
        temp->data = i;
        if (i == n) {
            temp->next = L;
            p->next = temp;
            break;
        }
        temp->next = NULL;
        p->next = temp;
        p = p->next;
    }
}
/**
  • æ‰“å°è¾“å‡ºç”¨æ¥æµ‹è¯•æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå¾ªç¯é“¾è¡¨
  • /
    void PrintList(LinkList &L, int n) {
      LinkList p = L;
      for (int i = 0; i < n;i++) {
      cout << p->data << " ";  p = p->next;
      }
    }
int main() {
    LinkList test;
    CircleList(test,5);
    PrintList(test, 12);
}

    int data;
    struct DuLNode *prior;
    struct DuLNode *next;
}DuLnode, *DuLinkList; 
/* åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨çš„åˆå§‹åŒ– */
void InitDuLinkList(DuLinkList &L) {
    L = new DuLNode;
    L->prior = NULL;
    L->next = NULL;
}
int main() {
    DuLinkList L;
    InitDuLinkList(L);
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆå§‹èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ä¸º100
    L->data = 100;
    // åœ¨Lç»“ç‚¹å‰é¢æ’å€¼50
    DuLinkList L_prior;
    L_prior->data = 50;
    L_prior->next = L;
    L->prior = NULL;
    L->prior = L_prior;
    // åœ¨Lç»“ç‚¹åé¢æ’å€¼150
    DuLinkList L_next;
    L_next->data = 150;
    L_next->prior = L;
    L_next->next = NULL;
    L->next = L_next;
    cout << L_prior->data << " " << L_prior->next->data << " " << L_prior->next->next->data<<"
";
    // åœ¨50å’Œ100ä¹‹é—´æ’å€¼75ï¼ˆåªæ“ä½œLç»“ç‚¹ï¼‰
    DuLinkList L_prior_L;
    L_prior_L->data = 75;
    L_prior_L->prior = L->prior;
    L->prior->next = L_prior_L;
    L_prior_L->next = L;
    L->prior = L_prior_L;
    cout << L->prior->prior->data << " " << L->prior->data << " " << L->data <<" "<< L->next->data<<"
";
    // åˆ é™¤75è¿™ä¸ªå€¼çš„ç»“ç‚¹(è®°ä½ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ é™¤å“ªä¸ªç»“ç‚¹å°±æ“ä½œå“ªä¸ªç»“ç‚¹)
    L_prior_L->next->prior = L_prior_L->prior;
    L_prior_L->prior->next = L_prior_L->next;
    cout << L->prior->data << " " << L->data << " " << L->next->data << "
";
}

ä»åå­—å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºArrayDequeåº•å±‚é€šè¿‡æ•°ç»„å®ç°ï¼Œä¸ºäº†æ»¡è¶³å¯ä»¥åŒæ—¶åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸¤ç«¯æ’å…¥æˆ–åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œè¯¥æ•°ç»„è¿˜å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å¾ªç¯çš„ï¼Œå³å¾ªç¯æ•°ç»„ï¼ˆcircular arrayï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´æ•°ç»„çš„ä»»ä½•ä¸€ç‚¹éƒ½å¯èƒ½è¢«çœ‹ä½œèµ·ç‚¹æˆ–è€…ç»ˆç‚¹ã€‚ArrayDequeæ˜¯éçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨çš„ï¼ˆnot thread-safeï¼‰ï¼Œå½“å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åŒæ—¶ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¨‹åºå‘˜æ‰‹åŠ¨åŒæ­¥ï¼›å¦å¤–ï¼Œè¯¥å®¹å™¨ä¸å…è®¸æ”¾å…¥nullå…ƒç´ ã€‚


import java.util.*;
public class ArrayDequeStack {
    public static void main(String[] args) {

        // ä¾æ¬¡å°†ä¸‰ä¸ªå…ƒç´ pushå…¥â€œæ ˆâ€ï¼Œå…ˆè¿›åå‡º
        stack.push("ç–¯ç‹‚Javaè®²ä¹‰");
        stack.push("è½»é‡çº§Java EEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®æˆ˜");
        stack.push("ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰");
        System.out.println(stack); // [ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰, è½»é‡çº§Java EEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®æˆ˜, ç–¯ç‹‚Javaè®²ä¹‰]
        System.out.println(stack.peek()); // ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰
        System.out.println(stack); // [ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰, è½»é‡çº§Java EEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®æˆ˜, ç–¯ç‹‚Javaè®²ä¹‰]
        System.out.println(stack.pop()); // ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰
        System.out.println(stack);//[è½»é‡çº§Java EEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®æˆ˜, ç–¯ç‹‚Javaè®²ä¹‰]
    // å½“åšé˜Ÿåˆ—æ¥ä½¿ç”¨,å…ˆè¿›å…ˆå‡º    ArrayDeque queue = new ArrayDeque();    queue.offer("ç–¯ç‹‚Javaè®²ä¹‰");    queue.offer("è½»é‡çº§JavaEEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®è·µ");    queue.offer("ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰");    System.out.println(queue); //[ç–¯ç‹‚Javaè®²ä¹‰, è½»é‡çº§JavaEEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®è·µ, ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰]    // è®¿é—®é˜Ÿåˆ—å¤´éƒ¨å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä½†ä¸å°†å…¶pollå‡ºé˜Ÿåˆ—    System.out.println(queue.peek());    System.out.println(queue);    // pollå‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´     System.out.println(queue.poll());    System.out.println(queue);// [è½»é‡çº§JavaEEä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å®è·µ, ç–¯ç‹‚Androidè®²ä¹‰]}
}

import java.util.Stack;
public class P232ImplementQueueUsingStacks{
    public void main(String[] args) {

        //æœ¬åœ°è°ƒè¯•éœ€è¦å°†MyQueueç±»å’Œä¸»å‡½æ•°åŠ ä¸Šé™æ€staticä¿®é¥°å­—

        myQueue.push(2); // queue is: [1, 2] (leftmost is front of the queue)
        myQueue.pop();
        myQueue.peek();
//        myQueue.peek(); // return 1
//        myQueue.pop(); // return 1, queue is [2]
//        myQueue.empty(); // return false
//        System.out.println(myQueue);
    }
//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
class MyQueue {
    Stack<Integer> stack_input = new Stack<>();
    Stack<Integer> stack_output = new Stack<>();
    /** Initialize your data structure here. */
    public MyQueue() {
//        Stack<Integer> stack_input = new Stack<>();
//        Stack<Integer> stack_output = new Stack<>();
    }
/** Push element x to the back of queue. */public void push(int x) {    stack_input.push(x);    int temp = stack_input.size();    if (stack_output.size() == 0) {        for (int i=0; i<temp; i++){            stack_output.push(stack_input.pop());        }    }}/** Removes the element from in front of queue and returns that element. */public int pop() {    int temp = stack_input.size();    if (stack_output.size() == 0) {        for (int i=0; i<temp; i++){            stack_output.push(stack_input.pop());        }    }    return stack_output.pop();}/** Get the front element. */public int peek() {    int temp = stack_input.size();    if (stack_output.size() == 0) {        for (int i=0; i<temp; i++){            stack_output.push(stack_input.pop());        }    }    return stack_output.peek();}/** Returns whether the queue is empty. */public boolean empty() {    if (stack_input.size() == 0 && stack_output.size() == 0) {        return true;    }    return false;}
}

import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.Queue;
public class P225ImplementStackUsingQueues{
    public void main(String[] args) {
//        Solution solution = new P225ImplementStackUsingQueues().new Solution();
}
//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
class MyStack {
    Queue<Integer> queue_input = new LinkedList<>();
    Queue<Integer> queue_output = new LinkedList<>();
    /** Initialize your data structure here. */
    public MyStack() {
}/** Push element x onto stack. */public void push(int x) {    queue_input.add(x);}/** Removes the element on top of the stack and returns that element. */public int pop() {    int temp_2 = queue_input.size();    for (int i=0; i<temp_2; i++) {        queue_output.add(queue_input.remove());    }    int temp_3 = queue_output.size();    for (int i=0; i<temp_3-1; i++) {        queue_input.add(queue_output.remove());    }    return queue_output.remove();}/** Get the top element. */public int top() {    int top = 0;    int temp_4 = queue_input.size();    for (int i=0; i<temp_4; i++) {        queue_output.add(queue_input.remove());    }    int temp_5 = queue_output.size();    for (int i=0; i<temp_5; i++) {        if (i == temp_5-1) {            top = queue_output.element();        }        queue_input.add(queue_output.remove());    }    return top;}/** Returns whether the stack is empty. */public boolean empty() {    if (queue_input.size() == 0 && queue_output.size() == 0) {        return true;    }    return false;}
}
/**
  • Your MyStack object will be instantiated and called as such:
  • MyStack obj = new MyStack();
  • obj.push(x);
  • int param_2 = obj.pop();
  • int param_3 = obj.top();
  • boolean param_4 = obj.empty();
  • /
    //leetcode submit region end(Prohibit modification and deletion)
}

ç„¶åæ¥æŠ›å‡ºå‡ ä¸ªé—®é¢˜æ¥åˆ†æä¹‹ï¼š


ã€Q1ã€‘å…¬é’¥å’Œå¯†é’¥æ€ä¹ˆæ¥è§„å®šå‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘è¦æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç½‘ç»œæ”»å‡»è€…ï¼Œæˆ‘åˆ©ç”¨å…¬é’¥æ¥æ¨ç†å‡ºå¯†é’¥ï¼Œé‚£æˆ‘å²‚ä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥è§£å¯†äº†ï¼Ÿï¼

" class="close-login">å…³é—­</a></span>        </div>        <div class="login-input-content">            <div class="login-input">                <label>ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š</label>                <input type="text" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å" name="info[username]" id="username" class="list-input">            </div>            <div class="login-input">                <label>ç™»å½•å¯†ç ï¼š</label>                <input type="password" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç™»å½•å¯†ç " name="info[password]" id="password" class="list-input">            </div>            <div class="login-input">                <input type="button" class="button-login" value="ç™»å½•ä¼šå‘˜"/>            </div>        </div>    </div>    <script>        var link = document.getElementById('link'); function findLengthOfLCIS(nums: number[]): number {  if (nums.length === 1) return 1  let head: number = 0  let next: number = 1  let result: number = 1  while (next !== nums.length) {    nums[next - 1] < nums[next]      ? (result = result <= next - head + 1 ? next - head + 1 : result)      : (head = next)    next++  }  return result}

package com.wztlink1013.problems.leetcode.editor.cn;
// P674.æœ€é•¿è¿ç»­é€’å¢åºåˆ—
// P674.longest-continuous-increasing-subsequence
//ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæœªç»æ’åºçš„æ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°æœ€é•¿ä¸” è¿ç»­é€’å¢çš„å­åºåˆ—ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›è¯¥åºåˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚
//
// è¿ç»­é€’å¢çš„å­åºåˆ— å¯ä»¥ç”±ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸‹æ ‡ l å’Œ rï¼ˆl < rï¼‰ç¡®å®šï¼Œå¦‚æœå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ª l <= i < rï¼Œéƒ½æœ‰ nums[i] < nums[i + 1] ï¼Œé‚£
//ä¹ˆå­åºåˆ— [nums[l], nums[l + 1], â€¦, nums[r - 1], nums[r]] å°±æ˜¯è¿ç»­é€’å¢å­åºåˆ—ã€‚
//
//
//
// ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š
//
//
//è¾“å…¥ï¼šnums = [1,3,5,4,7]
//è¾“å‡ºï¼š3
//è§£é‡Šï¼šæœ€é•¿è¿ç»­é€’å¢åºåˆ—æ˜¯ [1,3,5], é•¿åº¦ä¸º3ã€‚
//å°½ç®¡ [1,3,5,7] ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å‡åºçš„å­åºåˆ—, ä½†å®ƒä¸æ˜¯è¿ç»­çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸º 5 å’Œ 7 åœ¨åŸæ•°ç»„é‡Œè¢« 4 éš”å¼€ã€‚
//
//
// ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š
//
//
//è¾“å…¥ï¼šnums = [2,2,2,2,2]
//è¾“å‡ºï¼š1
//è§£é‡Šï¼šæœ€é•¿è¿ç»­é€’å¢åºåˆ—æ˜¯ [2], é•¿åº¦ä¸º1ã€‚
//
//
//
//
// æç¤ºï¼š
//
//
// 0 <= nums.length <= 104
// -109 <= nums[i] <= 109
//
// Related Topics æ•°ç»„
// ğŸ‘ 147 ğŸ‘ 0
public class P674LongestContinuousIncreasingSubsequence{
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Solution solution = new P674LongestContinuousIncreasingSubsequence().new Solution();
        int [] nums = {1,3,5,7};
        int result = solution.findLengthOfLCIS(nums);
        System.out.println(result);
    }
//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
class Solution {
    public int findLengthOfLCIS(int[] nums) {
        if (nums.length == 0) { return 0; }
        int result = 1;
        int count = 1;
        for (int i=0; i<nums.length-1; i++) {
            if (nums[i] < nums[i+1] ) {
                count++;
                if (result < count) {result = count;}
            } else {
                if (result < count) {result = count;}
                count = 1;
            }
        }
        return result;
    }
}
//leetcode submit region end(Prohibit modification and deletion)
}

// é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ˜¯ä¸€ç§åç¼€è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œæ‰€è°“åç¼€å°±æ˜¯æŒ‡ç®—ç¬¦å†™åœ¨åé¢ã€‚
//
//
// å¹³å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨çš„ç®—å¼åˆ™æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ä¸­ç¼€è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œå¦‚ ( 1 + 2 ) * ( 3 + 4 ) ã€‚
// è¯¥ç®—å¼çš„é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼å†™æ³•ä¸º ( ( 1 2 + ) ( 3 4 + ) * ) ã€‚
//
//
// é€†æ³¢å…°è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸»è¦æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸¤ä¸ªä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼š
//
//
// å»æ‰æ‹¬å·åè¡¨è¾¾å¼æ— æ­§ä¹‰ï¼Œä¸Šå¼å³ä¾¿å†™æˆ 1 2 + 3 4 + * ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¾æ®æ¬¡åºè®¡ç®—å‡ºæ­£ç¡®ç»“æœã€‚
// é€‚åˆç”¨æ ˆæ“ä½œè¿ç®—ï¼šé‡åˆ°æ•°å­—åˆ™å…¥æ ˆï¼›é‡åˆ°ç®—ç¬¦åˆ™å–å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°å­—è¿›è¡Œè®¡ç®—ï¼Œå¹¶å°†ç»“æœå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­ã€‚
//
// Related Topics æ ˆ
// ğŸ‘ 213 ğŸ‘ 0
import java.util.Stack;
public class P150EvaluateReversePolishNotation{
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Solution solution = new P150EvaluateReversePolishNotation().new Solution();
        String[] tokens_1 = {"10", "6", "9", "3", "+", "-11", "", "/", "", "17", "+", "5", "+"};
        int temp = solution.evalRPN(tokens_1);
        System.out.println(temp);
}
//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
class Solution {
    public int evalRPN(String[] tokens) {
        Stack<String> stack = new Stack<>();
    String temp = "0";    stack.push(temp);    for (String token : tokens) {        int sum = 0;        if (token.equals("+")) {            sum += Integer.parseInt(stack.pop()) + Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());            String str = String.valueOf(sum);            stack.push(str);        } else if (token.equals("-")) {            int i = Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());            int j = Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());            sum += j-i;            String str = String.valueOf(sum);            stack.push(str);        } else if (token.equals("*")) {            sum += Integer.parseInt(stack.pop()) * Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());            String str = String.valueOf(sum);            stack.push(str);        } else if (token.equals("/")) {            int i = Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());            int j = Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());            sum += j / i;            String str = String.valueOf(sum);            stack.push(str);        } else {            stack.push(token);        }    }    int result = Integer.parseInt(stack.pop());    return result;}
}
//leetcode submit region end(Prohibit modification and deletion)
}

entry.content:
é—®é¢˜æ€è·¯

ç”¨æ ˆæ¥ä½œä¸ºä¸´æ—¶å­˜å–éæ‹¬å·çš„æ±‚å’Œæ•°ã€‚å¯¹å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿›è¡Œé€ä¸ªéå†ï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹é‡åˆ°çš„æ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­

  • æ•°å­—ï¼šå°†å…¶æ±‚å’Œåˆ°sumå½“ä¸­
  • ï¼ˆï¼šå°†ä¸Šè¿°sumå’Œç¬¦å·å‹å…¥æ ˆå†…
  • ï¼‰ï¼šå°†æ ˆå†…çš„å…ƒç´ å–å‡ºä¸ç°æœ‰sumæ±‚å’Œ
  • +ï¼šç›´æ¥èµ°
  • -ï¼šç›´æ¥èµ°ä¸è¿‡ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªè®¡ç®—æ•°æå‰åŠ è´Ÿå·

ä»£ç å®ç°

package com.wztlink1013.problems.leetcode.editor.cn;
// P224.åŸºæœ¬è®¡ç®—å™¨
//å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºæœ¬çš„è®¡ç®—å™¨æ¥è®¡ç®—ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¡¨è¾¾å¼çš„å€¼ã€‚
//
// å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¡¨è¾¾å¼å¯ä»¥åŒ…å«å·¦æ‹¬å· ( ï¼Œå³æ‹¬å· )ï¼ŒåŠ å· + ï¼Œå‡å· -ï¼Œéè´Ÿæ•´æ•°å’Œç©ºæ ¼ ã€‚
//
// ç¤ºä¾‹ 1:
//
// è¾“å…¥: "1 + 1"
//è¾“å‡º: 2
//
//
// ç¤ºä¾‹ 2:
//
// è¾“å…¥: " 2-1 + 2 "
//è¾“å‡º: 3
//
// ç¤ºä¾‹ 3:
//
// è¾“å…¥: "(1+(4+5+2)-3)+(6+8)"
//è¾“å‡º: 23
//
// è¯´æ˜ï¼š
//
//
// ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾æ‰€ç»™å®šçš„è¡¨è¾¾å¼éƒ½æ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ã€‚
// è¯·ä¸è¦ä½¿ç”¨å†…ç½®çš„åº“å‡½æ•° evalã€‚
//
// Related Topics æ ˆ æ•°å­¦
// ğŸ‘ 309 ğŸ‘ 0
import java.util.Stack;
public class P224BasicCalculator{
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Solution solution = new P224BasicCalculator().new Solution();
        int key_1 = solution.calculate("7896979");
        int key_2 = solution.calculate("(23-2)-33+1111");
        System.out.println(key_1);
        System.out.println(key_2);
    }
//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
class Solution {
    public int calculate(String s) {
        Stack<Integer> stack_1 = new Stack<Integer>();
        int sum = 0;
        int sign = 1;
        int num = 0;
    for (int i=0;i<s.length();i++) {        char ch = s.charAt(i);        if (Character.isDigit(ch)) {            num = 10 * num + (int) (ch - '0');        } else if (ch == '+') {            num = num * sign;            sum = sum + num;            sign = 1;            num = 0;        } else if (ch == '-') {            num = num * sign;            sum = sum + num;            sign = -1;            num = 0;        } else if (ch == '(') {            stack_1.push(sum);            stack_1.push(sign);            sum = 0;            num = 0;            sign = 1;        } else if (ch == ')') {            num = num * sign;            sum = sum + num;            sum = stack_1.pop() * sum;            sum = sum + stack_1.pop();            num = 0;            sign = 1;        }    }    sum = sum + sign * num;    return sum;}}
//leetcode submit region end(Prohibit modification and deletion)
}

entry.title: 509. æ–æ³¢é‚£å¥‘æ•°ğŸ”–é€’å½’
entry.content:
• https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/fibonacci-number/

tså®ç°

function fib(n: number): number {  if (n <= 1) return n  return fib(n - 1) + fib(n - 2)}

javaå®ç°

class Solution {    // TODO: forå¾ªç¯å®ç°    public int fib(int N) {        if (N <= 1) return N;        int first = 0;        int second = 1;        for (int i = 0; i < N - 1; i++) {            int sum = first + second;            first = second;            second = sum;        }        return second;    }//    // TODO: é€’å½’å®ç°O(2^n)//    public int fib1(int n) {//        if (n <= 1) return n;//        return fib1(n - 1) + fib1(n - 2);//    }//    // TODO: é¦–å°¾å®ç°//    public int fib3(int n) {//        if (n <= 1) return n;//        int first = 0;//        int second = 1;//        while (n-- > 1) {//            second += first;//            first = second - first;//        }//        return second;//    }}

C++å®ç°

// é€’å½’ï¼šO(2^n)public static int fib1(int n) {    if (n <= 1) return n;    return fib1(n - 1) + fib1(n - 2);}
// forå¾ªç¯ï¼šO(n)
public static int fib2(int n) {
    if (n <= 1) return n;
    int first = 0;
    int second = 1;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
        int sum = first + second;
        first = second;
        second = sum;
    }
    return second;
}
// é¦–å°¾æ³•
public static int fib3(int n) {
    if (n <= 1) return n;
int first = 0;int second = 1;while (n-- > 1) {    second += first;    first = second - first;}return second;
}
// ç‰¹å¾æ–¹ç¨‹è§£æ³•ï¼šOï¼ˆ1ï¼‰
public static int fib4(int n) {
    double c = Math.sqrt(5);
    return (int) (Math.pow((1+c) / 2, n) - Math.pow((1-c) / 2, c));
}

entry.title: 486. é¢„æµ‹èµ¢å®¶ğŸ”–æ•°ç»„
entry.content:
• https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/predict-the-winner/

æ€è·¯

è´ªå¿ƒç­–ç•¥ä¸è¡Œï¼Œå¦‚æœç©å®¶æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½é€‰ç›¸å¯¹è‡ªå·±å½“ä¸‹å¯é€‰æ‹©çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œè¿™æ ·çš„è´ªå¿ƒç­–ç•¥æœ‰é”™è¯¯ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è¿™ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼š

è¾“å…¥ï¼šnums = [1,5,233,7]

è¾“å‡ºï¼štrue

è§£é‡Šï¼šç©å®¶ 1 ä¸€å¼€å§‹é€‰æ‹© 1 ã€‚ç„¶åç©å®¶ 2 å¿…é¡»ä» 5 å’Œ 7 ä¸­è¿›è¡Œé€‰æ‹©ã€‚æ— è®ºç©å®¶ 2 é€‰æ‹©äº†å“ªä¸ªï¼Œç©å®¶ 1 éƒ½å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹© 233 ã€‚

æœ€ç»ˆï¼Œç©å®¶ 1ï¼ˆ234 åˆ†ï¼‰æ¯”ç©å®¶ 2ï¼ˆ12 åˆ†ï¼‰è·å¾—æ›´å¤šçš„åˆ†æ•°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿”å› trueï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç©å®¶ 1 å¯ä»¥æˆä¸ºèµ¢å®¶ã€‚


javaå®ç°

class Solution {    public boolean PredictTheWinner(int[] nums) {        return total(nums, 0, nums.length - 1, 1) >= 0;    }
public int total(int[] nums, int start, int end, int turn) {    if (start == end) {        return nums[start] * turn;    }    int scoreStart = nums[start] * turn + total(nums, start + 1, end, -turn);    int scoreEnd = nums[end] * turn + total(nums, start, end - 1, -turn);    return Math.max(scoreStart * turn, scoreEnd * turn) * turn;
//        if(turn == 1){
//            return Math.max(scoreStart ,scoreEnd );
//        }else{
//            return Math.min(scoreStart ,scoreEnd );
//        }
    }
}

entry.title: 876. é“¾è¡¨çš„ä¸­é—´ç»“ç‚¹ğŸ”–é“¾è¡¨
entry.content:
876. é“¾è¡¨çš„ä¸­é—´ç»“ç‚¹

  • https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/middle-of-the-linked-list/

é—®é¢˜æè¿°

é—®é¢˜åˆ†æ

ä»£ç å®ç°

js

/** * Definition for singly-linked list. * function ListNode(val, next) { *     this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val) *     this.next = (next===undefined ? null : next) * } *//** * @param {ListNode} head * @return {ListNode} */var middleNode = function(head) {    let count = 0    let temp = head    while(temp) {        count++        temp = temp.next    }    for(let i = 0; i < (count-1)/2; i++) {        head = head.next    }    return head};

java

class Solution {    public ListNode middleNode(ListNode head) {        if (head.next == null) return head;        if (head.next.next == null) return head.next;
    ListNode slow = head.next;    ListNode fast = head.next.next;    while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {        slow = slow.next;        fast = fast.next.next;        if (fast == null) return slow;    }    return slow;}
}

entry.title: 83. åˆ é™¤æ’åºé“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„é‡å¤å…ƒç´ ğŸ”–é“¾è¡¨
entry.content:
• 83. åˆ é™¤æ’åºé“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„é‡å¤å…ƒç´ 

typescriptå®ç°

/** * Definition for singly-linked list. * class ListNode { *     val: number *     next: ListNode | null *     constructor(val?: number, next?: ListNode | null) { *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val) *         this.next = (next===undefined ? null : next) *     } * } */
function deleteDuplicates(head: ListNode | null): ListNode | null {
  let start = head
  while(start) {
    const next = start.next
    next && start.val === next.val && (start.next = next.next)
    start = start.next && start.val === start.next.val ? start :  start.next
  }
  return head
};

javaå®ç°

/** * public class ListNode { *     int val; *     ListNode next; *     ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */class Solution {  public ListNode deleteDuplicates(ListNode head) {    // TODO: å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆ    if (head == null) return head;    ListNode slow = head;    ListNode fast = head.next;    while (fast != null){      if (slow.val != fast.val) {        slow.next = fast;        slow = fast;      }      fast = fast.next;    }    slow.next = null;    return head;  }}// TODO: å•æŒ‡é’ˆä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥//class Solution {//    public ListNode deleteDuplicates(ListNode head) {//        ListNode cur = head;//        while(cur != null && cur.next != null) {//            if(cur.val == cur.next.val) {//                cur.next = cur.next.next;//            } else {//                cur = cur.next;//            }//        }//        return head;//    }//}

entry.title: 203. ç§»é™¤é“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´ ğŸ”–é“¾è¡¨
entry.content:
• https://leetcode.cn/problems/remove-linked-list-elements/description/

é€’å½’

javaä»£ç å®ç°

/** * public class ListNode { *     int val; *     ListNode next; *     ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */class Solution {  public ListNode removeElements(ListNode head, int val) {    // å°†æ•´ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨æƒ³è±¡æˆhead+å­é“¾è¡¨    if (head == null)      return null;    // å…ˆå¤„ç†å­é“¾è¡¨    head.next = removeElements(head.next, val);    // å†å¤„ç†å¤´ç»“ç‚¹    return head.val == val ? head.next : head;  }}

typescript

/** * Definition for singly-linked list. * class ListNode { *     val: number *     next: ListNode | null *     constructor(val?: number, next?: ListNode | null) { *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val) *         this.next = (next===undefined ? null : next) *     } * } */
function removeElements(head: ListNode | null, val: number): ListNode | null {
  if (!head) return null
  head.next = removeElements(head.next, val)
  return head.val === val ? head.next : head
};

å¦‚æœé“¾è¡¨ä¸­å­˜åœ¨ç¯ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› true ã€‚ å¦åˆ™ï¼Œè¿”å› false ã€‚

javaå®ç°

/** * public class ListNode { *     int val; *     ListNode next; *     ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */public class Solution {  public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {    if (head == null || head.next == null) return false;
// TODO: å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆListNode slow = head;ListNode fast = head.next;while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {  slow = slow.next;  fast = fast.next.next;  if (slow == fast) return true; //å¦‚æœèƒ½ç›¸é‡åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºæœ‰ç¯}return false; //ä¸èƒ½ç›¸é‡åˆ™æ²¡æœ‰ç¯
  }
}

typescriptå®ç°

/** * Definition for singly-linked list. * class ListNode { *     val: number *     next: ListNode | null *     constructor(val?: number, next?: ListNode | null) { *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val) *         this.next = (next===undefined ? null : next) *     } * } */
function hasCycle(head: ListNode | null): boolean {
  const set = new Set()
  while(head) {
    if (set.has(head)) return true
    set.add(head)
    head = head.next
  }
  return false
};

entry.content:

å‹ç¼©ç®—æ³•ï¼Œç›®çš„å°±æ˜¯æ ¹æ®å­—æ¯çš„å‡ºç°é¢‘ç‡æ¥â€œæŒ‰éœ€åˆ†é…â€ç¼–ç æ¥ä¼˜åŒ–ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼ã€‚

æ¯”å¦‚ï¼šç»™å‡ºä¸€ä¸²å­—æ¯ Huffman Coding Â Â ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§è®¡ç®—æœºå¤„ç†å½¢å¼ï¼Œä¼šæ ¹æ®ascllç å°†è¿™ä¸²å­—ç¬¦ç¼–ç ï¼Œå…·ä½“å½¢å¼ï¼ˆåè¿›åˆ¶ï¼‰å°±æ˜¯104 117 102 102 109 97 110 32 67 111 100 105 110 103ï¼Œç„¶åè½¬æ¢æˆäºŒè¿›åˆ¶ï¼Œæœ€åä¼šå¾—åˆ°éœ€è¦97ä¸ªæ¯”ç‰¹æ¥å­˜å‚¨ã€‚

ç®—æ³•æè¿°

ç®—æ³•è§’åº¦æ¥è®²å¯¹ä¸Šè¿°é—®é¢˜ascllç¼–ç æ–¹å¼æ˜¯æµªè´¹ç©ºé—´çš„ï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–æ–¹å‘æ˜¯æ”¹å˜ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ ¹æ®å­—æ¯å‡ºç°çš„é¢‘ç‡æ¥â€œæŒ‰éœ€åˆ†é…â€è¿›åˆ¶ä½ã€‚


ç»™å‡ºä¸‹é¢æ‰€ç»™å‡ºçš„å­—æ¯ï¼Œä»¥åŠå‡ºç°çš„é¢‘ç‡ï¼Œæ¥å¾—åˆ°å“ˆå¤«æ›¼ç¼–ç 

å…ˆæå‡ºå°†é¢‘ç‡å°çš„ä¾æ¬¡åŠ å…¥ã€‚då’Œhç»„åˆæƒå€¼ä¸º9(æˆ–è€…è¯´Aåªæ˜¯ç§°å‘¼æ–¹ä¾¿)ï¼Œç„¶åå°†è¿™ä¸ª9â€œæ›¿æ¢då’Œhâ€ä»£å…¥æ•´ä¸ªåºåˆ—ï¼Œåœ¨è¿›è¡Œæ’å…¥æ ‘æ“ä½œï¼Œ

è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œéµå¾ªæ•°å­—å¤§çš„åœ¨å·¦æ•°å­—å°çš„åœ¨å³åŸåˆ™ï¼ˆäº’æ¢ä¹Ÿæ²¡å…³ç³»ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡æ¢çš„æ˜¯äºŒè¿›åˆ¶çš„0å’Œ1ï¼‰

åœ¨è¿›è¡Œåˆ°Eçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—åº”è¯¥ä¸º120 107 42 37ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ­¤æ—¶éœ€è¦é‡æ–°è°ƒæ•´é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œç„¶åè¿›è¡Œåˆ°ç»“æŸã€‚


æœ€åçš„ç¼–ç ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š

ç¼–ç å®ç°

#include <stdio.h>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>namespace NS_HuffmanCoding {using namespace std;void BuildHuffmanTree();void Initialization(vector<pair<char, int>> chars);void Finalization();struct HFMNode {  char Ch; int Freq;  HFMNode* Left, * Right;  HFMNode(char pCh, int pFreq, HFMNode* pLeft, HFMNode* pRight)    : Ch(pCh), Freq(pFreq), Left(pLeft), Right(pRight) {}  HFMNode(char pCh, int pFreq)    : HFMNode(pCh, pFreq, NULL, NULL) {}};void MinHeapify(vector<HFMNode*>& H);void InsertH(vector<HFMNode*>& H, HFMNode* node);void SiftDown(vector<HFMNode*>& H, int i);void SiftUp(vector<HFMNode*>& H, int i);HFMNode* ExtractMin(vector<HFMNode*>& H);void DeleteANode(HFMNode* node);void ShowInput(vector<pair<char, int>> chars);void Output();static vector<HFMNode*> Q;void HuffmanCodingCaller(vector<pair<char, int>> chars){  ShowInput(chars);  Initialization(chars);  BuildHuffmanTree();  Output();  Finalization();}void BuildHuffmanTree(){  char C = 'A';  while (Q.size() > 1)  {    HFMNode* x = ExtractMin(Q);    HFMNode* y = ExtractMin(Q);    HFMNode* z = new HFMNode(C++, x->Freq + y->Freq, x, y);    InsertH(Q, z);  }}HFMNode* ExtractMin(vector<HFMNode*>& H){  swap(H.front(), H.back());  HFMNode* p = H.back();  H.pop_back();  if (!H.empty())    SiftDown(H, 0);  return p;}void SiftDown(vector<HFMNode*>& H, int i){    while ((i = (i << 1) + 1) < H.size()) {        if ((i + 1 < H.size()) && (H[i + 1]->Freq < H[i]->Freq))            i = i + 1;        if (H[(i - 1) >> 1]->Freq > H[i]->Freq)            swap(H[(i - 1) >> 1], H[i]);        else break;    }}void InsertH(vector<HFMNode*>& H, HFMNode* node){  H.push_back(node);  SiftUp(H, H.size() - 1);}void SiftUp(vector<HFMNode*>& H, int i){  while (i > 0 && H[i]->Freq < H[(i - 1) >> 1]->Freq) {    swap(H[i], H[(i - 1) >> 1]);    i = (i - 1) >> 1;  }}void MinHeapify(vector<HFMNode*>& H){  for (int i = (H.size() >> 1) - 1; i >= 0; i--) {    SiftDown(H, i);  }}
void Initialization(vector<pair<char, int>> chars)
{
  Q.clear();
  for (auto ch : chars)
    Q.push_back(new HFMNode(ch.first, ch.second));
  MinHeapify(Q);
}
void Finalization()
{
  DeleteANode(Q[0]);
}
void DeleteANode(HFMNode* node)
{
  if (node->Left)
  {
    DeleteANode(node->Left);
    DeleteANode(node->Right);
  }
  delete node;
}
void ShowInput(vector<pair<char, int>> chars)
{
  printf("Huffman coding input: 
");
  for (auto c : chars)
    printf("%c,%d; ", c.first, c.second);
  printf("
");
}
static vector<char> coding;
static vector<pair<char, vector<char>>> codingList;
void GetHuffmanCoding(HFMNode* node)
{
  if (node->Left)
  {
    coding.push_back(â€˜0â€™);
    GetHuffmanCoding(node->Left);
    coding.pop_back();
    coding.push_back(â€˜1â€™);
    GetHuffmanCoding(node->Right);
    coding.pop_back();
  }
  else
  {
    codingList.push_back(pair<char,
      vector<char>>(node->Ch, coding));
  }
}
void Output()
{
  printf("Huffman coding:
");
  coding.clear();
  codingList.clear();
  GetHuffmanCoding(Q[0]);
  sort(codingList.begin(), codingList.end());
  for (auto c1 : codingList)
  {
    printf("  %c: ", c1.first);
    for (auto c2 : c1.second)
      printf("%c", c2);
    printf("
");
  }
  printf("
");
}
} //namespace NS_HuffmanCoding
using namespace NS_HuffmanCoding;
void TestHuffmanCoding()
{
  vector<vector<pair<char, int>>> charLists = {
      //Introduction to Algorithms
     {
        { {â€˜aâ€™,40}, {â€˜bâ€™,13}, {â€˜câ€™,12},
          {â€˜dâ€™,16}, {â€˜eâ€™,9}, {â€˜fâ€™,5} },
     },
     //Ã‘ÃÃÂµÃƒÃ´
     {
        { {â€˜aâ€™,5}, {â€˜bâ€™,29}, {â€˜câ€™,7}, {â€˜dâ€™,8},
          {â€˜eâ€™,14}, {â€˜fâ€™,23}, {â€˜gâ€™,3}, {â€˜hâ€™,11} },
     },
  };
  int n = charLists.size();
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
  {
    HuffmanCodingCaller(charLists[i]);
  }
}

å•ç‹¬åˆ†æâ‘ â‘¡è¾¹å’Œâ‘¢â‘£è¾¹æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªä¸åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆé‡Œé¢ï¼Œ

ä¸æ–­é‡å¤ï¼Œä¸æ–­åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºåŒä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆï¼Œä¸åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±åˆå¹¶ï¼ŒæŒç»­å¦‚æ­¤ã€‚æ¯”æ–¹è¯´å½“ä¸€ç›´æ“ä½œåˆ°æƒå€¼ä¸º3çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°±éœ€è¦å°†å·¦å³ä¸¤ä¸ªé›†åˆåˆå¹¶äº†

Kruskalç®—æ³•ä»£ç 

#include <stdio.h>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>namespace NS_KruskalMST {using namespace std;void KruskalMST();int FindSet(int u);void UnionSets(int u, int v);void Initialization();void GenEdges();void MakeSets();void Output(int v0);#define INF INT_MAXstatic int n;static vector<vector<int>> WMatrix;static vector<pair<pair<int, int>, int>> Edges;//Node struct for the disjoint setstruct DJSNode {    int Parent; int Rank;    DJSNode(int p) : Parent(p), Rank(0) {}};static vector<DJSNode> DisjointSet;static vector<pair<int, int>> MST;//The adjacency list for MSTstatic vector<vector<int>> MSTList;static vector<int> Prev;void KruskalMSTCaller(int an,     vector<vector<int>> &wMatrix, int v0){    n = an;    WMatrix = wMatrix;    Initialization();    KruskalMST();    Output(v0);}void KruskalMST(){    for (auto &e: Edges)    {        int u = e.first.first;        int v = e.first.second;        int setU = FindSet(u);        int setV = FindSet(v);        if (setU != setV)        {            MST.push_back(e.first);            if (MST.size() == n - 1)                break;            UnionSets(setU, setV);        }    }}int FindSet(int u){    while (u != DisjointSet[u].Parent)        u = DisjointSet[u].Parent;        //For path compression:        //DisjointSet[u].Parent =         //    FindSet(DisjointSet[u].Parent);    return u;}void UnionSets(int u, int v){    if (DisjointSet[u].Rank >= DisjointSet[v].Rank)        DisjointSet[v].Parent = u;    else        DisjointSet[u].Parent = v;    if (DisjointSet[u].Rank == DisjointSet[v].Rank)        DisjointSet[u].Rank++;}void Initialization(){    GenEdges();    sort(Edges.begin(), Edges.end(),         [](pair<pair<int, int>, int>a,             pair<pair<int, int>, int>b)        {return a.second < b.second; });    MakeSets();    MST.clear();}void GenEdges(){    Edges.clear();    //Traverse the upper triangle of WMatrix    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)    {        for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++)            if (WMatrix[i][j] != INF)                Edges.push_back({ {i, j},                    WMatrix[i][j] });    }}void MakeSets(){    DisjointSet.clear();    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)        DisjointSet.push_back(DJSNode(i));}void OutputWMatrix(){    printf("n = %d
", n);    printf("The weight matrix:
");    printf("%3c", ' ');    for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)        printf("%3d", j + 1);    printf("
");    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)    {        printf("%3d", i + 1);        for (auto j : WMatrix[i])            if (j < INF)                printf("%3d", j);            else                printf("%3c", '*');        printf("
");    }}void OutputPath(int u){    if (Prev[u] == -1)        printf("%d", u + 1);    else    {        OutputPath(Prev[u]);        printf("-%d", u + 1);    }}void GenMSTList(){    MSTList.clear();    MSTList.resize(n);    for (auto &e: MST)    {        MSTList[e.first].push_back(e.second);        MSTList[e.second].push_back(e.first);    }}void GenPrev(int v){    for (auto &u : MSTList[v])        if (u != -1)        {            Prev[u] = v;            auto w = find(MSTList[u].begin(),                 MSTList[u].end(), v);            MSTList[u][w - MSTList[u].begin()] = -1;            GenPrev(u);        }}void Output(int v0){    printf("Kruskal's MST algorithm
");    OutputWMatrix();    int wSum = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)        wSum += WMatrix[MST[i].first][MST[i].second];    GenMSTList();    Prev.clear();    Prev.resize(n);    Prev[v0] = -1;    GenPrev(v0);    printf("The MST edges:
");    printf("Edge Weight
");    for (auto &e : MST)        printf(" %d-%d  %d
", e.first + 1, e.second + 1,            WMatrix[e.first][e.second]);    printf("Total MST weight: %d
", wSum);    printf("The MST paths from vertex %d:
", v0 + 1);    for (int u = 0; u < n; u++)        if (u != v0)        {            printf("%3d: ", u + 1);            OutputPath(u);            printf("
");        }    printf("
");}} //namespace NS_KruskalMSTusing namespace NS_KruskalMST;void TestKruskalMST(int v0 = 0){    vector<vector<vector<int>>> w = {        //https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/        //prims-minimum-spanning-tree-mst-greedy-algo-5/        {            {   0,  2,INF,  6,INF },            {   2,  0,  3,  8,  5 },            { INF,  3,  0,INF,  7 },            {   6,  8,INF,  0,  9 },            { INF,  5,  7,  9,  0 }        },        // Dijkstra's algorithm on Wikipedia        {            {   0,  7,  9,INF,INF, 14 },            {   7,  0, 10, 15,INF,INF },            {   9, 10,  0, 11,INF,  2 },            { INF, 15, 11,  0,  6,INF },            { INF,INF,INF,  6,  0,  9 },            {  14,INF,  2,INF,  9,  0 },        },        //https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/        //kruskals-minimum-spanning-tree-using-stl-in-c/        {            {   0,  4,INF,INF,INF,INF,INF,  8,INF },            {   4,  0,  8,INF,INF,INF,INF, 11,INF },            { INF,  8,  0,  7,INF,  4,INF,INF,  2 },            { INF,INF,  7,  0,  9, 14,INF,INF,INF },            { INF,INF,INF,  9,  0, 10,INF,INF,INF },            { INF,INF,  4, 14, 10,  0,  2,INF,INF },            { INF,INF,INF,INF,INF,  2,  0,  1,  6 },            {   8, 11,INF,INF,INF,INF,  1,  0,  7 },            { INF,INF,  2,INF,INF,INF,  6,  7,  0 },        },    };    int k = w.size();    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++)    {      if (v0 > w[i].size() - 1)        v0 = w[i].size() - 1;      KruskalMSTCaller(w[i].size(), w[i], v0);    }}

//C++ éšæœºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç”Ÿæˆå‡½æ•°#include<iostream>#include<ctime>using namespace std; 
const int LEN_NAME=4;
char *rand_str(char *str,const int len)
{
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<len;++i)
        str[i]=â€™Aâ€™+rand()%26;
    str[++i]=â€™\0â€™;
    return str;
}
void main()
{
    srand(time(NULL));
    int i;
    char name[LEN_NAME+1];
for(i=0;i<20;++i){    cout<<rand_str(name,LEN_NAME)<<endl;}
}

#include <string>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>#include<iostream>#include<ctime>
const int LEN_NAME=100;
namespace NS_LSEditDist {
    using namespace std;
    void Initialization(const string &x, const string &y);
    int GetLSEditDist(const string &x, const string &y);
    void GetLSEdits(const string &x, const string &y);
    void Output(const string &x, const string &y, int OptD);
    void OutputE(const string &x, const string &y);
    void OutputP(const string &x, const string &y);
    static int m, n;
    static vector<vector<int>> E;
    static vector<vector<char>> P;
    static string xe, ye;
    void LSEditDistCaller(const string &x, const string &y)
    {
        Initialization(x, y);
        int OptD = GetLSEditDist(x, y);
        GetLSEdits(x, y);
        Output(x, y, OptD);
    }
    int GetLSEditDist(const string &x, const string &y)
    {
        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
            {
                E[i][j] = min(E[i - 1][j] + 1,
                              min(E[i][j - 1] + 1,
                                  E[i - 1][j - 1] + (x[i - 1] != y[j - 1])));
                if (E[i][j] == E[i - 1][j] + 1)
                    P[i][j] = â€˜Uâ€™;
                else if (E[i][j] == E[i][j - 1] + 1)
                    P[i][j] = â€˜Lâ€™;
                else if (x[i - 1] != y[j - 1])
                    P[i][j] = â€˜1â€™;
            }
        return E[m][n];
    }
    void GetLSEdits(const string &x, const string &y)
    {
        int i = m, j = n;
        while (i > 0 || j > 0)
        {
            if (P[i][j] == â€˜0â€™ || P[i][j] == â€˜1â€™)
            {
                xe.insert(0, 1, x[i - 1]);
                ye.insert(0, 1, y[j - 1]);
                iâ€“; jâ€“;
            }
            else if (P[i][j] == â€˜Uâ€™)
            {
                xe.insert(xe.begin(), x[i - 1]);
                ye.insert(ye.begin(), â€˜-â€˜);
                iâ€“;
            }
            else
            {
                xe.insert(xe.begin(), â€˜-â€˜);
                ye.insert(ye.begin(), y[j - 1]);
                jâ€“;
            }
        }
    }
    void Initialization(const string &x, const string &y)
    {
        m = x.length();
        n = y.length();
        E.clear();
        E.resize(m + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));
        P.clear();
        P.resize(m + 1, vector<char>(n + 1, â€˜0â€™));
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
        {
            E[0][j] = j;
            P[0][j] = â€˜Lâ€™;
        }
        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
        {
            E[i][0] = i;
            P[i][0] = â€˜Uâ€™;
        }
        xe.clear();
        ye.clear();
    }
    void Output(const string &x, const string &y, int OptD)
    {
        printf("Levenshtein distance: 
");
        printf("Strings: %s, %s

", x.c_str(), y.c_str());
        OutputE(x, y);
        OutputP(x, y);
        printf("Distance: %d
", OptD);
        printf("Edited strings:
");
        for (auto c : xe)
            printf("%2c", c);
        printf("
");
        for (auto c : ye)
            printf("%2c", c);
        printf("

");
    }
    void OutputE(const string &x, const string &y)
    {
        printf(" E  ");
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
            printf("%2c", y[j]);
        printf("
");
        for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++)
        {
            if (i == 0)
                printf("  ");
            else
                printf("%2c", x[i - 1]);
            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++)
            {
                printf("%2d", E[i][j]);
            }
            printf("
");
        }
        printf("
");
    }
    void OutputP(const string &x, const string &y)
    {
        printf(" P  ");
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
            printf("%2c", y[j]);
        printf("
");
        for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++)
        {
            if (i == 0)
                printf("  ");
            else
                printf("%2c", x[i - 1]);
            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++)
            {
                printf("%2c", P[i][j]);
            }
            printf("
");
        }
        printf("
");
    }
} //namespace NS_LSEditDist
char *rand_str(char *str,const int len)
{
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<len;++i)
        str[i]=â€™aâ€™+rand()%26;
    str[++i]=â€™\0â€™;
    return str;
}
using namespace NS_LSEditDist;
int main()
{
    vector<vector<string>> abs = {
            { "water", "wheat" },
            { "servant", "reveal" }
    };
    for (auto ab : abs)
    {
        string a = ab[0];
        string b = ab[1];
        LSEditDistCaller(a, b);
    }
cout<<"ä¸¤ä¸ª100ä½å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„LevenShteinè·ç¦»ï¼š"<<endl;srand(time(NULL));int i;char name[LEN_NAME+1];string x = rand_str(name,LEN_NAME);string y = rand_str(name,LEN_NAME);cout<<"å­—ç¬¦ä¸²1ï¼š"<<x<<endl;cout<<"å­—ç¬¦ä¸²2ï¼š"<<y<<endl;LSEditDistCaller(x, y);
}

import java.net.InetAddress;import java.net.MalformedURLException;import java.net.URL;import java.net.UnknownHostException;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.Scanner;
public class CommandUtil {
String tracert = "tracert -h 10 "; //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿtracertå‘½ä»¤String ping = "ping";//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ ping å‘½ä»¤String routePrint = "route print -4";//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿroute printå‘½ä»¤public static void main(String args[]){    String input = null;    @SuppressWarnings("resource")    Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);    //åˆ©ç”¨whileå¾ªç¯æ¥æ”¶è¾“å…¥çš„å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå‚æ•°    while(true){        System.out.println("Please input destination server IP address ï¼š\n");        input = scanner.next();        CommandUtil host = new CommandUtil();        host.tracert = host.tracert + " " + input;        host.ping = host.ping + " " + input;        try {            host.command(host.routePrint);        } catch (IOException exception) {            exception.printStackTrace();        }        try {            host.command(host.tracert) ;        } catch (IOException exception) {            exception.printStackTrace();        }        try {            host.command(host.ping);        } catch (IOException exception) {            exception.printStackTrace();        }        InetAddress ipAddress;        try {            ipAddress = InetAddress.getByName(input);            System.out.println("IP address : "+ipAddress);        } catch (UnknownHostException exception) {            exception.printStackTrace();        }        URL url;        try {            url = new URL("http",input,80,"index.html");            System.out.println();//è¾“å‡ºæœåŠ¡å™¨åœ°å€            System.out.println("Get the Server-Name# : "+url.getHost());            System.out.println();//è¾“å‡ºé¦–é¡µæ–‡ä»¶            System.out.println("Get the default file# : "+url.getFile());            System.out.println();//è¾“å‡ºé¦–é¡µåè®®å’Œç«¯å£            System.out.println("Get the protocol# : "+url.getProtocol()+" "+url.getPort());            System.out.println();        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        System.out.println();        try {            System.out.println("Get serverName & IPAddressï¼š"+InetAddress.getByName(input));        } catch (UnknownHostException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        long freeMemory = Runtime.getRuntime().freeMemory();        System.out.println("Surplus memory of JVM: "+freeMemory+"B");    }}//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ tracert å‘½ä»¤StringBuffer commandResult = null;private void command(String tracerCommand) throws IOException{    //ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šåˆ›å»ºè¿›ç¨‹(æ˜¯æ¥å£ä¸å¿…åˆå§‹åŒ–)    //1.é€šè¿‡Runtimeç±»çš„getRuntime().exec()ä¼ å…¥éœ€è¦è¿è¡Œçš„å‘½ä»¤å‚æ•°    System.out.println();    System.out.println(InetAddress.getByName("localhost")+" is tracking the destination server...");    Process process = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(tracerCommand);    readResult(process.getInputStream());    process.destroy();}//ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šé€šè¿‡è¾“å…¥æµæ¥å°†å‘½ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœè¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ§åˆ¶å°private void readResult(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException{    commandResult = new StringBuffer();  //åˆå§‹åŒ–å‘½ä»¤è¡Œ    String commandInfo = null; //å®šä¹‰ç”¨äºæ¥æ”¶å‘½ä»¤è¡Œæ‰§è¡Œç»“æœçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²    BufferedReader bufferedReader =            new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(inputStream));    while ( (commandInfo = bufferedReader.readLine()) != null)  {        System.out.println(commandInfo);    }    bufferedReader.close();}
}

package com.wztlink1013.ds.queue;import com.wztlink1013.ds.queue.list.LinkedList;import com.wztlink1013.ds.queue.list.List;public class Queue<E> {    private List<E> list = new LinkedList<>();    public int size() {        return list.size();    }    public boolean isEmpty() {        return list.isEmpty();    }    public void clear() {        list.clear();    }    public void enQueue(E element) {        list.add(element);    }    public E deQueue() {        return list.remove(0);    }    public E front() {        return list.get(0);    }}

DequeåŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—è®¾è®¡

åŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯èƒ½åœ¨å¤´å°¾ä¸¤ç«¯æ·»åŠ ã€åˆ é™¤çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—

package com.wztlink1013.ds.queue;
import com.wztlink1013.ds.queue.list.LinkedList;
import com.wztlink1013.ds.queue.list.List;
public class Deque<E> {
    private List<E> list = new LinkedList<>();
public int size() {    return list.size();}public boolean isEmpty() {    return list.isEmpty();}public void clear() {    list.clear();}public void enQueueRear(E element) {    list.add(element);}public E deQueueFront() {    return list.remove(0);}public void enQueueFront(E element) {    list.add(0, element);}public E deQueueRear() {    return list.remove(list.size() - 1);}public E front() {    return list.get(0);}public E rear() {    return list.get(list.size() - 1);}
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define MAXSIZE 100
/**
  • é¡ºåºè¡¨
  • é¡ºåºè¡¨çš„åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œï¼š åˆå§‹åŒ–ã€æ‰“å°ã€å–å€¼ã€æŸ¥æ‰¾ã€æ’å…¥ã€åˆ é™¤ã€å‡åºã€é€†ç½®
  • /
/* é¡ºåºè¡¨çš„å­˜å‚¨å½¢å¼å°±æ˜¯è¿ç»­å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´ï¼Œåœ°å€è¿ç»­çš„ï¼Œå…¶å®å°±æ˜¯æ•°ç»„ */
typedef struct {
    int *arr;
    int length;
}SqList;
/* åˆå§‹åŒ– */
void InitList(SqList &L)
{
    L.arr = new int[MAXSIZE];
    if (!L.arr) exit(-1);
    L.length = 0;
}
/* åˆå§‹åŒ–æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´  /
void ListInsert(SqList &L) {
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°nï¼š";
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n;i++){
        cin >> L.arr[i];
        L.length++;
    }
}
/ æ‰“å° /
void TraverseList(SqList &L) {
    cout << "è¯¥é¡ºåºè¡¨å…ƒç´ éå†ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š";
    for (int i = 0; i < L.length;i++) {
        cout << L.arr[i] << â€˜ â€˜;
    }
    cout << "
";
}
/ æœ€å¤§å€¼ */
void NumberMax (SqList &L){
    cout << "è¯¥é¡ºåºè¡¨æœ€å¤§å€¼ä¸ºï¼š";
    int max = L.arr[0];
    for (int i = 0; i < L.length;i++) {
        if(L.arr[i]>max)
            max = L.arr[i];
    }
    cout << max<<"
";
}
/* æ’å€¼ */
void InsertOneElement (SqList &L) {
    cout << "è¯·åˆ†åˆ«è¾“å…¥åœ¨nä½ç½®æ’å…¥çš„eå€¼ï¼š";
    int n;
    int e;
    cin >> n >> e;
    for (int i = L.length - 1; i >= n-1;iâ€“){
        L.arr[i + 1] = L.arr[i];
    }
    L.arr[n-1] = e;
    L.length++;
    cout << "
"<<"æ’å…¥å€¼ä¹‹åçš„é¡ºåºè¡¨ä¸ºï¼š";
    TraverseList(L);
}
/* åˆ é™¤ /
void DeleteOneElement (SqList &L) {
    cout << "è¯·è¾“å…¥è¦åˆ é™¤nä½ç½®çš„nå€¼ï¼š";
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < L.length;i++){
        if (i>=n-1){
            L.arr[i] = L.arr[i + 1];
        }
    }
    L.lengthâ€“;
    cout << "
"<<"åˆ é™¤å€¼ä¹‹åçš„é¡ºåºè¡¨ä¸ºï¼š";
    TraverseList(L);
}
/ å‡åº /
void IncrList (SqList &L) {
    cout << "å‡åºä¹‹åçš„é¡ºåºè¡¨ä¸ºï¼š";
    for (int i = 0; i < L.length;i++){
        for (int j = 0; j < L.length;j++){
            if (L.arr[j]>L.arr[i]) {
                int temp;
                temp = L.arr[j];
                L.arr[j] = L.arr[i];
                L.arr[i] = temp;
            }
        }
    }
    TraverseList(L);
}
/ é€†ç½® */
void ReverseList (SqList &L) {
    cout << "é€†åºä¹‹åâ€¦â€¦";
    for (int i = 0; i < L.length / 2;i++){
        int temp;
        temp = L.arr[i];
        L.arr[i] = L.arr[L.length-i-1];
        L.arr[L.length-i-1] = temp;
    }
    TraverseList(L);
}
int main () {
    SqList test;
    InitList(test);//1
    ListInsert(test);//1
    TraverseList(test);//1
    NumberMax(test);//2
    InsertOneElement(test);//3
    DeleteOneElement(test);//4
    IncrList(test);//5
    ReverseList(test);//6
}

entry.content:
• https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/valid-parentheses/

é—®é¢˜æ€è·¯

å°†æ‰€æœ‰çš„å·¦åŠè¾¹æ‹¬å·pushåˆ°æ ˆå†…ï¼Œç„¶åé‡åˆ°å³åŠè¾¹æ‹¬å·ï¼Œå°±å°†å…¶ä¸æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ åŒ¹é…æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œè‹¥èƒ½åŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸåˆ™ç»§ç»­åŒ¹é…ï¼Œåä¹‹è¾“å‡ºfalseã€‚


åœ¨è¿™ä¹‹é—´æ³¨æ„æ¯”è¾ƒå½“æ ˆå†…æ²¡æœ‰å…ƒç´ äº†ï¼Œè€Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿˜æœ‰å¾…åŒ¹é…çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºfalseï¼Œå½“æ ˆå†…è¿˜æœ‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¤–é¢ä¸ä¹‹åŒ¹é…æµ‹è¯•çš„å³åŠè¾¹æ‹¬å·ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¾“å‡ºfalseã€‚

tså®ç°

function isValid(s: string): boolean {  let stack: Array<string> = []  for (let i of s) {    if (['(', '[', '{'].includes(i)) {      stack.push(i)    } else {      switch (i) {        case ')':          if (stack[stack.length - 1] === '(') {            stack.pop()          } else {            return false          }          break        case ']':          if (stack[stack.length - 1] === '[') {            stack.pop()          } else {            return false          }          break        case '}':          if (stack[stack.length - 1] === '{') {            stack.pop()          } else {            return false          }          break      }    }  }  return stack.length ? false : true}

ä¹‹å‰çš„javaä»£ç å®ç°

æ ˆå®ç°

class Solution {    public boolean isValid(String s) {        Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();
    int len = s.length();    for (int i=0;i<len;i++) {        char c = s.charAt(i);        if (c == '(' || c == '[' || c == '{') {            stack.push(c);        } else {            if (stack.isEmpty()) return false;            char left = stack.pop();            if (left == '(' && c !=')') return false;            if (left == '[' && c !=']') return false;            if (left == '{' && c !='}') return false;        }    }    return stack.isEmpty();}
}

class Solution {    public boolean isValid(String s) {        Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();        for (int i = 0; i< s.length();i++){            if (s.charAt(0) == ')' || s.charAt(0) == ']' || s.charAt(0) == '}'){                return false;            }            if (s.charAt(i) == '(' || s.charAt(i) == '[' || s.charAt(i) == '{'){                stack.push(s.charAt(i));            }            if (s.charAt(i) == ')' || s.charAt(i) == ']' || s.charAt(i) == '}'){                if (s.charAt(i) == ')'){                    if (stack.isEmpty() == true) {                        return false;                    }                    if (stack.pop() != '(')                        return false;                }                if (s.charAt(i) == ']'){                    if (stack.isEmpty() == true) {                        return false;                    }                    if (stack.pop() != '[')                        return false;                }                if (s.charAt(i) == '}'){                    if (stack.isEmpty() == true) {                        return false;                    }                    if (stack.pop() != '{')                        return false;                }            }        }        if (stack.isEmpty() == true){            return true;        } else {            return false;        }    }}

HashMapå®ç°

class Solution {    private static HashMap<Character, Character> map = new HashMap<>();    static {        // key - value        map.put('(', ')');        map.put('{', '}');        map.put('[', ']');    }    
public boolean isValid(String s) {    Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();        int len = s.length();    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        char c = s.charAt(i);        if (map.containsKey(c)) { // å·¦æ‹¬å·            stack.push(c);        } else { // å³æ‹¬å·            if (stack.isEmpty()) return false;                        if (c != map.get(stack.pop())) return false;        }    }    return stack.isEmpty();}
}

package com.wztlink1013.ds.stack;import com.wztlink1013.ds.stack.list.ArrayList;import com.wztlink1013.ds.stack.list.List;public class Stack<E> {    private List<E> list = new ArrayList<>();    public void clear() {        list.clear();    }    public int size() {        return list.size();    }    public boolean isEmpty() {        return list.isEmpty();    }    public void push(E element) {        list.add(element);    }    public E pop() {        return list.remove(list.size() - 1);    }    public E top() {        return list.get(list.size() - 1);    }}

entry.title: GitHub+PicGoæ„å»ºå…è´¹å›¾åºŠåŠå…¶é«˜æ•ˆä½¿ç”¨
